long: left||Insignia of the Fordham ROTC unit File:GEN Colin Powell.JPG|thumb||Colin Powell, alumnus of Fordham Military Science program  The Fordham Military Science program is available to all undergraduate and graduate students, regardless of their chosen course of study. It is also available to students at more than fifty other colleges and universities in the New York metropolitan area. The program consists of membership and training in the Ram Battalion of the Army Reserve Officer Training Corps (ROTC) and a sequence of military science classes taught on campus.
